name: Extreme Jump
description:
Welcome to Extreme Jump!
- tap to jump into the platforms and make points.

- if two platforms are on top of each other in the (almost) same direction, you will get a bonus.
- more platforms (making a stack / tower), bigger is the bonus.
- but do not let the platforms push (or hit) you, or you'll lose the game!

Can you do better than your friends? Can you be one of the top players in the leaderboard?

Enjoy!
